copy.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The select that should be mirrored.

*See also: [Copy Select](https://esphome.io/components/copy.html#copy-select)*

modbus_controller.docs:
The `modbus_controller` Select platform allows you to create a Select from modbus registers.

*See also: [Modbus Controller Select](https://esphome.io/components/select/modbus_controller.html#modbus-controller-select)*

template.docs:
The `template` Select platform allows you to create a Select with templated values using [lambdas](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-lambda).

*See also: [Template Select](https://esphome.io/components/select/template.html#template-select)*

tuya.docs:
The `tuya` select platform creates a select from a tuya serial component and requires [Tuya MCU](https://esphome.io/components/tuya.html) to be configured.

*See also: [Tuya Select](https://esphome.io/components/select/tuya.html#tuya-select)*

on_value.docs:
**[Automation](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#automation)**: An automation to perform when a new value is published. See [on_value](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#select-on-value).

*See also: [Select Component](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#base-select-configuration)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the select to set.

*See also: [Select Component](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#select-operation-action)*

option.docs:
**string, [templatable](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-templatable)**: The option to set the select to.

*See also: [Select Component](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#select-set-action)*

set.docs:
You can also set an option for the template select from elsewhere in your YAML file with the [select.set Action](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#select-set-action).

*See also: [`select.set` Action](https://esphome.io/components/select/template.html#select-set-action)*

index.docs:
**int, [templatable](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-templatable)**: The index offset of the option to be activated.

*See also: [Select Component](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#select-set-index-action)*

set_index.docs:
This is an [Action](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-action) for setting the active option using its index offset.

*See also: [`select.set_index` Action](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#select-set-index-action)*

last.docs:
This is an [Action](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-action) for selecting the last option in a select component.

*See also: [`select.last` Action](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#select-last-action)*

first.docs:
This is an [Action](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-action) for selecting the first option in a select component.

*See also: [`select.first` Action](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#select-first-action)*

cycle.docs:
**boolean**: Whether or not to jump to the last option of the select when the first option is currently selected. Defaults to `true`.

*See also: [Select Component](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#select-previous-action)*

previous.docs:
This is an [Action](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-action) for selecting the previous option in a select component.

*See also: [`select.previous` Action](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#select-previous-action)*

cycle.docs:
**boolean**: Whether or not to jump back to the first option of the select when the last option is currently selected. Defaults to `true`.

*See also: [Select Component](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#select-next-action)*

next.docs:
This is an [Action](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-action) for selecting the next option in a select component.

*See also: [`select.next` Action](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#select-next-action)*

operation.docs:
**string, [templatable](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-templatable)**: The operation to perform. One of `FIRST`, `LAST`, `PREVIOUS` or `NEXT` (case insensitive). When writing a lambda for this field, then return one of the following enum values: `SELECT_OP_FIRST`, `SELECT_OP_LAST`, `SELECT_OP_PREVIOUS` or `SELECT_OP_NEXT`.

*See also: [Select Component](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#select-operation-action)*

cycle.docs:
**bool, [templatable](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-templatable)**: Can be used for options `NEXT` and `PREVIOUS` to specify whether or not to wrap around the options list when respectively the last or first option in the select is currently active.

*See also: [Select Component](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#select-operation-action)*

operation.docs:
This is an [Action](https://esphome.io/guides/automations.html#config-action) that can be used to change the active option in a select component (first, last, previous or next), using a generic templatable action call.

*See also: [`select.operation` Action](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#select-operation-action)*
